cookingMethod: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
While the pasta is cooking, cook the pancetta or bacon in a large skillet until crispy.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes.
In a bowl, beat together the eggs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the pancetta and garlic. Toss until well combined.
Remove the skillet from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture until it coats the spaghetti and forms a creamy sauce.
Serve hot and sprinkle with additional Parmesan cheese if desired.
